#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100003
#define eps  1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;


int a,b,c;
int64 dp[101][101][101];

int64 go(int64 tot,int64 playd,int64 yetplay){
	if(tot==c){
		if(yetplay)
		return 0;
		return 1;
	}
	
	if(dp[tot][playd][yetplay]!=-1)
	return dp[tot][playd][yetplay];
	
	int64 ret=0;
	//repeat
	if(playd>b)
	ret=(playd-b)*go(tot+1,playd,yetplay);
	ret%=MAXN;
	// no repeat
	if(yetplay)
	ret+=yetplay*go(tot+1,playd+1,yetplay-1);
	
	ret%=MAXN;
	dp[tot][playd][yetplay]=ret;
	return ret;
}
int main(){
	memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
	cin>>a>>b>>c;
	cout<<go(0,0,a)<<endl;
}
